backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing GA4-related features, affected files, components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend components, assets, and tracking utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color tokens, dark-mode variables, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading GA4 via hardcoded measurement ID and bootstrapping the Vite React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Primary React app component with hero slider, services, contact info, map embed, and initialization of GA4 tracking utilities.
frontend/src/components/BusinessHighligh: Grid of business info items linking to maps, call, and WhatsApp with responsive icon-based layout.
frontend/src/components/MobileCareSmartU: Component showing mobile care facts with show-more toggle and two-column responsive list layout.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image wrapper that adds fallback UI on load failure and resets error state when src changes.
frontend/src/components/TickerBanner.tsx: Scrolling ticker banner repeating product-category text in a continuous animation.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppQuickMes: Popover-based WhatsApp quick-messages selector generating prefilled wa.me links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, logout, and status handling using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, light/dark theme variables, typography, and utility classes including animations.
frontend/src/lib/analyticsConfig.ts: Centralizes analytics configuration for GTM and GA4 using environment variables.
frontend/src/lib/assetVersion.ts: Provides a version constant and helper to append cache-busting query parameters to asset URLs.
frontend/src/lib/clickTracking.ts: Tracks delegated WhatsApp and tel link clicks and sends GA4 events, with idempotent initialization.
frontend/src/lib/ga4.ts: Safe wrappers for GA4 event and page_view tracking that no-op when GA is unavailable.
frontend/src/lib/googleTracking.ts: Initializes Google Tag Manager and verifies GA4 loading with safe, idempotent setup.
frontend/src/lib/scrollDepthTracking.ts: Tracks scroll depth at key thresholds using RAF throttling and fires GA4 events once per load.
frontend/src/lib/spaPageViews.ts: Patches history navigation to send GA4 page_view events for SPA routing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color themes, animations, typography, container queries, and custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and state, including GA4 integration details and feature requests.
